resources:
Weatpaper Weatpaper Springtime Edition! A smart wallpaper that automatically adapts to the weather, time of day, and location. Summer Update will be available on June 22nd! Remember to update! Start! How it's working? How it's working? The application will automatically change the wallpaper on your smartphone depending on the weather, time of day and season. Now you know what the weather is like outside right now! Back! Important! Developed by Paweł Delinowski
paweldelinowski@outlook.com
www.weatpaper.com The application will change the wallpaper every hour depending on the time of day, weather, and your location. To make sure everything works according to plan, remember to: Internet Connection
Location enabled
running application After clicking the start button, you can minimize the application, but remember not to close it! Privacy policy Stop App! Tło aplikacji What's new? button_updates
